data.caption: Results - Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2023 (Unaudited - Standalone & Consolidated)
data.news_body: This is to inform that the BOD, inter alia, approved the un-audited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) (UFR) of the Co. for the quarter and nine months ended Dec 31, 2023 as recommended by the Audit Committee at their respective meeting(s) held today (February 08, 2024). The UFR of the Co. is enclosed along with the limited review report on both standalone & consolidated results issued by M/s. BSR & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors. (Reg 33). The un-audited financial results (Standalone and consolidated) will be uploaded on the website of the Co. at www.ranegroup.com and stock exchanges at www.bseindia.com and www.nseindia.com (Reg 46). An Earnings release for the above results is also enclosed (Reg 30). The meeting of the BoD commenced at 16:55 hrs (IST) and concluded at 17:27 hrs (IST).

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Meeting Held On February 08, 2024 - Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI LODR
data.news_body:
This is to inform that the Board of Directors, inter alia, approved the un-audited financial results (standalone & consolidated) (UFR) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended Dec 31, 2023 as recommended by the audit committee at their respective meeting(s) held today (February 08, 2024).

The UFR of the Company is enclosed along with the Limited Review Report on both standalone & consolidated results issued by M/s. BSR & Co., LLP, Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors. (Regulation 33).

The un-audited financial results (standalone & consolidated) will be uploaded on the website of the company at www.ranegroup.com and stock exchanges at www.bseindia.com and www.nseindia.com (Regulation 46). An 'earnings release' for the above results is also enclosed (Regulation 30).

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 16:55 hrs (IST) and concluded at 17:27 hrs (IST).

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For March 31, 2021 (Audited Standalone And Consolidated)
data.news_body:
This is to inform that the BoD have, approved the audited financial results (standalone & consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021 (AFR), as recommended by the audit committee at their respective meeting(s) held today,(May 27, 2021).

The AFR is enclosed along with the Independent Auditor''s Report on both AFR issued by M/s. BSR & CO., LLP, Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors. Further, declaration in respect of unmodified opinion on the AFR is enclosed (Regulation 33).

The extract of the consolidated Results is being published in newspapers, i.e., ''Business Standard'' and ''Dinamani'' in the format prescribed (Regulation 47).

The AFR shall be available on the website of the company at www.ranegroup.com and stock exchanges at www.bseindia.com and www.nseindia.com (Regulation 46). An ''earnings release'' for the above results is also enclosed(Regulation 30).

The meeting of the BoD commenced at 12:45 hrs and concluded at 16:25 hrs (IST).
